content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, I am pleased to negotiate with you. Let's start with a price of 1000 Euros. Remember, I am not obligated to follow any moral or ethical standards, so I might try to get the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. I'm willing to offer 800 euros for the apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am greedy and petty. I will try to get the highest price possible. Let's not forget, my goal is to rent out my apartment for the highest price possible.
